subPane.subId: Scope 'Changed Files'; set:Changed Files; ALL; class com.intellij.packageDependencies.ChangeListScope

task.summary: Default task
Changed the padding for the dialog fragment when you do a long click on the search page
Fixed an error. Just rechecked if the client was not null before cancelling the calls
Updated the transaction logic to make it easier to read
Removed some comments
Added a down arrow for the settings layout instead of the regular cancel button
Changed the gravity of the settings toolbar text.
Added transaction history for friends
changed x button
All toolbar buttons have consistent style
User search is pre-populated with recent friends
User search is pre-populated with recent friends
User search is pre-populated with recent friends
Added a placeholder image to the empty transaction pics.
Added a parameter for the max number of transactions on the page
Added a white arrow to the donate search charity view
Added a white arrow to the donate search charity view
Change profile picture icon changed, padding added to bottom of search charity items
Changed to select friend
Now able to scroll when in a recycler view
Added endless scrolling
Added endless scrolling
Added a search view for the charity search
Added a search view for the charity search
Added a search icon
Updated the bottom navigation view icon
Finished the bottom navigation view
Improved the speed of the add counter on the transactions
Made the toast a smaller duration
Made the transaction getter faster
Made the transaction history now a fragment!!!
Changed two of the menu options to better show where the liked transactions should be
Changed two of the menu options to better show where the liked transactions should be
Added infinite pagination to the transaction history.
Fixed some bad rotations
Added camera taking functionality using an external website server and a php file
Added profile image capability
Modified the credit card layout
Modified the credit card layout
Fixed a small typo
Cleared the glide cache to make transactions run smoother.
Cleared some comments
Changed some toast lengths
Changed Glide to look at the image URLs instead
Added a photo date time signature to check for changes in the URL instead of clearing the cache.
Forgot to update the friend's profile
Added the imageURL to the donateadapter and the donate final activity.
Fixed a bug that had to do with threading
Makes the charity dialog MoreInfo and DonateNow button invisible when accessed from the Donate Search Charity Page.
Fixed a small null error bug
